greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of n having no more odd than even parts.
comment: a(n) = Sum_{k=-floor(n/2)+(n mod 2)..0} A240009(n,k). - _Alois P. Heinz_, Mar 30 2014
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
maple: b:= proc(n, i, t) option remember; `if`(n=0,
mathematica: $RecursionLimit = 1000; b[n_, i_, t_] := b[n, i, t] = If[n == 0, If[t <= 0, 1, 0], If[i<1, 0, b[n, i-1, t] + If[i>n, 0, b[n-i, i, t+(2*Mod[i, 2]-1)]]]]; a[n_] := b[n, n, 0]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 80}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jun 30 2015, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 21 2010
